DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether individual difference acute response drug co-vary across three drug different drug class : alcohol , amphetamine delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) . The investigator hypothesize individual experience great reward effect one drug also experience reward effect drug .
DOC.detailed_description: Here , investigator aim investigate whether individual exhibit similar response three different drug different class . This study use within-subjects design ( total N = 24 ) . All subject receive alcohol , amphetamine delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) double-blind , double-dummy fashion . Subjects complete six session wherein receive either alcohol , amphetamine , THC , correspond placebo , separate day . Subjects complete questionnaire mood , general drug effect , specific drug effect .
DOC.criteria: English fluency High school education BMI 19 26 Individuals report drink least 4 alcoholic drink one occasion past month individual medical condition contraindicate study participation , determine physician individual regularly use contraindicate medication individual current dependence drug past dependence alcohol , marijuana stimulant individual past year DSMIV Axis I mood , anxiety , eat , psychotic disorder woman pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant next 3 month individual drink 10 alcoholic drink per week individual currently use ) illicit drug weekly frequently , ii ) stimulant prescription drug , iii ) 10 cigarette per week , iv ) 3 cup coffee per day
